text:
<@U026103R3> <@U026PLK4S> <@U0260V1BX> <@U0GN0A9EV>: Walking through and double checking the spec sheet for vinyl, I only noticed a few things we should take a second look at: 
I am wondering if Prototype Lab and Canvas needs one vinyl signage or two? Also wondering if Treatment A is best for the type of doors Prototype Lab will have. Everything else is good to go! 

<@U026PLK4S> <@U0260V1BX>: Can you guys give me another details on what you were thinking for a secondary type style?
My initial thought was to use the same weight of Chap, just smaller. And small enough so that it’s clear that it’s a different style and doesnt look like a mistake.
Another idea could be to use the secondary font, Mark Pro
The goal should be to clearly label those rooms but really allow the “Materials” room names to be the heroes.

<@U026103R3> <@U026PLK4S> <@U0260V1BX> <@U0GN0A9EV>: New prototypes are up for secondary type styles on Parent’s, Prototype, Experience, Wood Shop and A/V. I used the same font at 100pt instead of the 170pt. There’s also a new prototype in Canvas, it’s on the sliding door so carefully open to check em out.
thanks melodee, will check it out
